app.title: UniqU
app.subtitle: Your personalized career journey starts here.

onboarding.question: Where are you right now?
onboarding.option_burnout: I feel burned out and need direction
onboarding.understanding_situation: Understanding your current situation helps us create a more meaningful experience for you.
onboarding.what_to_expect_desc: By the end of this journey, you'll have a clear understanding of your unique value, specific insights about what motivates you, and a personalized roadmap for your next steps. This is about rediscovering your direction, not just generating documents.
onboarding.where_now_placeholder: Tell us a little bit more about your current situation.
onboarding.step2_title: Let's take this one step at a time
onboarding.step2_desc: I'm here to guide you through a thoughtful reflection process. There are no perfect answers — just honesty about where you are and where you'd like to go.
onboarding.step2_point1: We'll explore your past experiences and what you've built
onboarding.step2_point2: Discover what truly motivates and energizes you
onboarding.step2_point3: Create a clear roadmap for your next chapter

next_steps.title: What Happens Next?
next_steps.heading: What Happens Next?
next_steps.description: Now that you've uncovered your unique career insights, you can take the next step: create personalized application letters for your dream companies, explore more resources, or revisit your answers for even deeper clarity. We're here to support you every step of the way!

ready.title: Your Results Are Ready!
ready.heading: Your results are ready!
ready.subheading: Are you ready for a transformative career experience?
ready.description: You’ve completed a journey of self-discovery and reflection. Now, it’s time to see what your answers reveal about your unique strengths, passions, and opportunities. Take a deep breath and get ready for insights that could change your career path forever!

document.reflection_letter_desc: Your personalized career reflection and insights
document.career_themes_desc: Key themes and patterns identified in your career path
document.ideal_companies_desc: Companies that align with your values and goals
document.matching_companies_desc: Companies that match your profile and interests
document.explore_more_desc: Check out your other career insights or update your profile for fresh perspectives.
document.not_found_desc: The requested document could not be found. It may still be processing or there was an error generating it.

generating.title: Generating Your Career Analysis
generating.heading: Generating Your Career Analysis
generating.description: Our AI is analyzing your responses and creating personalized career guidance documents...
generating.analysis_time: Analysis typically takes one to two minutes to complete
generating.early_reading_message: You can start reading the completed documents below while the others finish generating!
generating.auto_redirect: Once all 3 documents are ready, you'll be automatically redirected to view your complete analysis
generating.parallel_generation: Documents are generated in parallel, so they may complete in any order
generating.create_application_letters: You can then create personalized application letters for specific companies

letters.title: Application Letters
letters.heading: Application Letters
letters.subheading: Generate and track your personalized application letters
letters.generate_based_on_job_opening: Generate new letter based on job opening
letters.job_url_hint: Paste the URL of the job posting you want to apply for.
letters.key_pain_points: Key pain points of the company:
letters.pain_points_placeholder: What challenges does this company face? What problems need solving?
letters.pain_points_hint: These will be used to tailor your application letter to address specific company needs.
letters.address_placeholder:
Company Name
Street Address
City, Postal Code
Country
letters.address_hint: Full company address for proper letter formatting.
letters.no_letters_desc: Generate your first application letter to get started with your job applications.
letters.try_again_or_contact_support: Please try again or contact support.

all_documents.title: All Generated Documents
all_documents.heading: All Generated Documents
all_documents.subheading: Below is a list of all documents generated for this session.

results.title: Your Career Analysis Results
results.heading: Your Career Analysis Results
results.heading_with_name: here are your Career Analysis Results
results.subheading: View and download your personalized career guidance documents
results.analysis_in_progress_desc: Some documents are still being generated. This page will auto-refresh.
results.ai_generating_time: This typically takes 30-60 seconds to complete.
results.reflection_letter_desc: Your personalized reflection and motivation letter based on your career assessment.
results.career_themes_desc: Key themes and insights about your ideal career path and working style.
results.ideal_companies_desc: View this generated document based on your career assessment.
results.application_letters_desc: Generate personalized application letters for companies that match your profile.
results.create_custom_letters: Create custom letters for specific companies
results.use_ai: Use AI to tailor letters to company needs
results.application_letters_available_after: Available after your career analysis documents are complete

landing.subtitle: Enter your email to begin your journey.
landing.user_not_found: User not found. Please check your email and try again.
landing.welcome_back: Welcome back! Taking you to your dashboard...
landing.welcome_start: Welcome! Let's start with a guided introduction...

overview.title: Step 1: Your Life Context
overview.heading: Step 1: Your Life Context
overview.intro: Tell us about your background, values, goals, and context to start your journey
overview.life_context_placeholder: Tell us about your current life situation and any important context...
overview.personality_bullet1: How do you prefer to work? (independently, in teams, etc.)
overview.personality_bullet2: What values are most important to you?
overview.personality_bullet3: What kind of work environment brings out your best?
overview.personality_placeholder: Tell us about your personality, work style, and core values...
overview.goals_bullet1: What kind of role or industry excites you?
overview.goals_bullet2: What impact do you want to have in your career?
overview.goals_bullet3: Any specific companies or work environments you're drawn to?
overview.goals_placeholder: Describe your career goals and aspirations...
overview.doubts_bullet1: What worries or uncertainties do you have about your next steps?
overview.doubts_bullet2: Are there any obstacles or fears holding you back?
overview.doubts_bullet3: Sharing these can help us support you better.
overview.doubts_placeholder: What concerns or obstacles are you thinking about regarding your career path?
overview.emotional_title: How are you feeling about your journey?
overview.emotional_bullet1: Are you feeling excited, anxious, hopeful, or uncertain?
overview.emotional_bullet2: It's normal to have mixed emotions during transitions.
overview.emotional_bullet3: Naming your feelings can help you move forward with clarity.
overview.emotional_placeholder: Excited, uncertain, ready for change? Share your current emotional state...

goals.bullet1: What kind of role or industry excites you?
goals.bullet2: What impact do you want to have in your career?
goals.bullet3: Any specific companies or work environments you're drawn to?
goals.textarea_placeholder: Describe your career goals and aspirations...

personality_values.bullet2: What values are most important to you?
personality_values.bullet3: What kind of work environment brings out your best?

emotional_landscape.title: How are you feeling about your journey?

step2.title: Step 2: Your Experience
step2.heading: Share Your Professional Story
step2.intro: Let's continue with your CV or resume. This helps us understand your background and experience.
step2.method_heading: How would you like to provide your CV?
step2.paste_text_desc: Paste your CV or resume content directly into the box.
step2.paste_text_placeholder: Paste your CV or resume content here... Include your work experience, education, skills, and any other relevant information.
step2.upload_file_desc: Upload a PDF version of your CV or resume.
step2.drag_drop_hint: Drag and drop your PDF here, or click to select a file.
step2.content_editable_desc: You can review and edit the extracted text below.

step3.title: Step 3: Discover Your Ikigai
step3.heading: Discover Your Ikigai
step3.intro: These five questions will help us understand what drives you, what you're passionate about, and what gives your life meaning.

love.explainer: Reflect on the activities and passions that make you feel alive.
love.title: What do you love?
love.textarea_placeholder: Describe what brings you joy and fulfillment...
love.inspiration_text: What activities make you feel truly alive and energized? Think about hobbies, interests, or work you are passionate about.
love.inspiration_examples: Examples: Playing music, helping others, solving puzzles, building things.

good_at.step_heading: Step 3: What are you good at?
good_at.explainer: Think about your natural talents and developed skills.
good_at.title: What are you good at?
good_at.textarea_placeholder: Describe your skills, talents, and what you excel at...
good_at.inspiration_text: What activities come naturally to you? What skills have you developed? When do people turn to you for help or advice? Think about tasks for which you've been praised or recognized.
good_at.inspiration_examples: Examples: People ask me for tech advice... I'm known for keeping houseplants alive. Friends come to me for relationship advice.

care_about.step_heading: Step 3: What do you care about?
care_about.explainer: Reflect on the causes or issues that deeply matter to you.
care_about.title: What do you care about?
care_about.textarea_placeholder: What causes or issues deeply matter to you?
care_about.inspiration_text: What societal, environmental, or humanitarian issues ignite your passion? What problems do you see that you want to help fix?
care_about.inspiration_examples: Examples: Better access to education in developing countries. Building a circular economy. Diversity and inclusion.

inspires.explainer: Consider the industries, fields, or people that inspire you.
inspires.title: What inspires you?
inspires.textarea_placeholder: What industries, fields, or people inspire you?
inspires.inspiration_text: What industries, fields, or people inspire you? Think about what you admire in others or what you find fascinating.
inspires.inspiration_examples: Examples: Space exploration, social entrepreneurs, artists, scientists, activists.

want_to_be.step_heading: Step 3: Who do you want to become?
want_to_be.explainer: Think about the qualities you admire and the impact you want to have.
want_to_be.title: Who do you want to become?
want_to_be.textarea_placeholder: Who do you want to become? What impact do you want to have?
want_to_be.inspiration_text: Think about the qualities you admire in others, the legacy you want to leave, or the kind of impact you hope to have on your community or the world.
want_to_be.inspiration_examples: Examples: I want to be known as someone who lifts others up. I hope to inspire my children to follow their dreams. I want to be a leader who brings out the best in my team.

generate.title: Congratulations on finishing the questions!
generate.congrats_text: You have shown incredible dedication and self-reflection. That’s what sets successful people apart. When you click Generate, you’ll receive a personalized analysis—a major revelation about yourself that could change your future direction.
generate.next_chapter: Take a deep breath and get ready for your next chapter. We look forward to showing you what you’ve discovered!

dashboard.profile_complete: You have a completed UniqU profile. What would you like to do?

questionnaire.how_it_works_desc: Answer each section honestly. Your answers are private and help us generate the best results for you.
questionnaire.time_and_privacy: This process takes about 10-15 minutes. Your data is secure and confidential.
